name: Puzzle of Words
summary:
New way of learning words by having fun 
-Lots of puzzle images 
-Many language options 
-Different game styles 
-Learn how the words are pronounciated 
-Learn how the words are written 
-Puzzle package store 
-Race with your friends on the scoreboard
